description: System-generated unique identifier for the GL code record; used as the primary key.
Date and time the record was created or last updated, in yyyymmddhhmmssmmm format; likely a system load or update timestamp; confirm with SME.
Human-readable description of the general ledger cost center or department associated with the code.
Full general ledger account string, composed of multiple segments (e.g., fund, division, department, program, project) separated by dashes, used to allocate fleet-related costs.
Optional free-text comments or annotations about the GL code.
Identifier of the corresponding record in the legacy/source system; used for cross-reference during migration.
Name of the legacy/source table where this record originated; used for data lineage and migration audit.
